product_name: Moving Comfort Metro Bermuda Shorts - Women's
long_description: With a little extra coverage for your workout, the Moving Comfort Metro Bermuda Shorts for women feature super comfortable performance fabric that's ready to go hard. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric helps you stay comfortable; shirring at seams adds a fun look. Soft, ribbed waistband with a stretchy drawcord dials in the fit. Front hand pockets. The Moving Comfort Metro Bermuda Shorts for women offer a relaxed fit with a 11.5 in. inseam.
short_description: With a little extra coverage for your workout, the Moving Comfort Metro Bermuda Shorts for women feature super comfortable performance fabric that's ready to go hard.
